segments.text: That is the most beautiful sunset !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's stop the car and enjoy it for a minute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is a good place . Let's get out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow . We don't get to see this in the city !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mother Nature is quite an artist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look behind us at the mountains ! They're reflecting pink !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Amazing . The sun is almost gone and yet there is still color everywhere !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where is our camera ? Let's see if we can catch this on film !
segments.speaker: S2
